bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR WEIGHT MANAGEMENT

nplcit.text: "GI Diet Plan: Guide to GI Eating Habits". 26 APR 2006. Retreived 25 SEP 2013 from

abstract.p: A system and method for weight management and loss is provided. The system and method regulate the quantity and constitution of the food and the system and method regulate the speed at which a meal is consumed so as to trigger a natural satiety response. In one aspect of the invention there is provided a timer (11) adapted to communicate with a subject during a meal over a predetermined time interval, whereon the subject in response to the timer completes the meal on or after the expiry of said predetermined time interval.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for weight management
System and method for weight management

abstract.p: 596224 A system and method for weight management and loss is provided. The system and method regulate the quantity and constitution of the food and the system and method regulate the speed at which a meal is consumed so as to trigger a natural satiety response. A timer (11) is adapted to operate over a predetermined time interval, the timer adapted to: instruct the subject to consume a portion of the meal over an eating interval
instruct the subject to pause consumption of the meal over a resting interval
alternate the eating and resting intervals continually over the predetermined time interval to cause the subject to complete the meal on or after the expiry of the predetermined time interval.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR WEIGHT MANAGEMENT
SYSTÈME ET PROCÉDÉ DESTINÉS À UNE GESTION DE POIDS

abstract.p: A system and method for weight management and loss is provided. The system and method regulate the quantity and constitution of the food and the system and method regulate the speed at which a meal is consumed so as to trigger a natural satiety response. In one aspect of the invention there is provided a timer (11) adapted to communicate with a subject during a meal over a predetermined time interval, whereon the subject in response to the timer completes the meal on or after the expiry of said predetermined time interval.

La présente invention concerne un système et un procédé destinés à une gestion et une perte de poids. Le système et le procédé régulent la quantité et la constitution de la nourriture et le système et le procédé régulent la vitesse à laquelle un repas est consommé de façon à déclencher une réponse naturelle de satiété. Dans un aspect de l'invention, une minuterie (11) est fournie, qui est adaptée pour communiquer avec un sujet pendant un repas au cours d'un intervalle de temps prédéterminé. Le sujet, en réponse à la minuterie, finit le repas pendant ou après l'expiration dudit intervalle de temps prédéterminé.
